name: Back Extension
description: Strengthens the lower back, focusing on the spinal erectors.

name: Floor Back Extension
description: Targets the lower back, focusing on spinal mobility and core strength.

name: Jefferson Curl
description: Improves flexibility and strength in the lower back and hamstrings.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound movement that targets the entire posterior chain, including the lower back, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Pendlay Row
description: Targets the entire back with a strict barbell row from the floor.

name: Rack Pull
description: Focuses on the upper back and traps with a partial deadlift movement.

name: Superman
description: Strengthens the lower back and glutes with a bodyweight floor exercise.

name: Back Extension (Machine)
description: Strengthens the lower back with controlled machine resistance.

name: Back Extension (Hyperextension)
description: Targets the lower back and hamstrings with a bodyweight hyperextension.

name: Back Extension (Weighted Hyperextension)
description: Strengthens the lower back and glutes with added weight resistance.

name: Chest Supported Reverse Fly (Dumbbell)
description: Engages the rear delts and upper back with a reverse fly motion.

name: Dead Hang
description: Improves grip strength and decompresses the spine, engaging the lats and shoulders.

name: Rear Delt Reverse Fly (Cable)
description: Engages the rear delts and upper back using cable resistance for a reverse fly motion.

name: Rear Delt Reverse Fly (Dumbbell)
description: Strengthens the rear delts and upper back with a dumbbell reverse fly.

name: Rear Delt Reverse Fly (Machine)
description: Isolates the rear delts and upper back with machine-guided movement.

name: Face Pull (Cable)
description: Strengthens the upper back and rear delts by pulling a rope attachment towards the face.

name: Good Morning (Barbell)
description: Strengthens the lower back, glutes, and hamstrings through hip hinging with a barbell on the shoulders.

name: Shrug (Barbell)
description: Targets the trapezius muscles by lifting the shoulders upwards while holding a barbell.

name: Upright Row (Barbell)
description: Engages the traps and shoulders by lifting a barbell vertically to chest height.

name: Reverse Plank
description: Strengthens the lower back and glutes by holding the body in a reverse plank position.

name: Superman Hold
description: An isometric hold of the Superman position to strengthen the lower back and glutes.
